data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Machado, Margarida, Sala, Jordi (2013): Tanymastigites lusitanica sp. nov. (Crustacea: Branchiopoda: Anostraca) from Portugal, first representative of the genus in Europe. Zootaxa 3681 (5): 501-523, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.5.1
